content.speaker: None
content.text:
______

                           HON. MIKE McINTYRE

                           of north carolina

                    in the house of representatives

                        Wednesday, July 20, 2005

content.speaker: Mr. McINTYRE
content.text:
Mr. McINTYRE. Mr. Speaker, on Tuesday, July 19, 2005, I was 
unavoidably detained and therefore absent for rollcall vote 384, on 
agreeing to House Resolution 365. Had I been present I would have voted 
``no'' on rollcall vote 384.
